name: 3dANOVA3
author: AFNI Developers
description: Performs three-factor ANOVA on 3D data sets.

inputs.description: Type of ANOVA model to be used. k = 1: A,B,C fixed; AxBxC, k = 2: A,B,C random; AxBxC, k = 3: A fixed; B,C random; AxBxC, k = 4: A,B fixed; C random; AxBxC, k = 5: A,B fixed; C random; AxB,BxC,C(A)
inputs.name: ANOVA Model Type

inputs.description: Number of levels for factor A.
inputs.name: Factor A Levels

inputs.description: Number of levels for factor B.
inputs.name: Factor B Levels

inputs.description: Number of levels for factor C.
inputs.name: Factor C Levels

inputs.description: Input data sets for specific levels of factors A, B, and C.
inputs.name: Datasets

inputs.description: Screen output for specified voxel number.
inputs.name: Voxel Number

inputs.description: Print out disk space required for program execution.
inputs.name: Disk Space

inputs.description: Use sub-brick #0 of dataset to define which voxels to process.
inputs.name: Mask Dataset

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the main ANOVA result.
inputs.name: Output File A

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the main B ANOVA result.
inputs.name: Output File B

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the main C ANOVA result.
inputs.name: Output File C

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the interaction between A and B.
inputs.name: Output File AB

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the interaction between A and C.
inputs.name: Output File AC

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the interaction between B and C.
inputs.name: Output File BC

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the interaction between A, B, and C.
inputs.name: Output File ABC

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the A mean results.
inputs.name: Output File A Mean

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the B mean results.
inputs.name: Output File B Mean

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the C mean results.
inputs.name: Output File C Mean

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the overall mean results.
inputs.name: Output File Overall Mean

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the A difference results.
inputs.name: Output File A Difference

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the B difference results.
inputs.name: Output File B Difference

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the C difference results.
inputs.name: Output File C Difference

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the overall difference results.
inputs.name: Output File Overall Difference

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the A contrast results.
inputs.name: Output File A Contrast

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the B contrast results.
inputs.name: Output File B Contrast

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the C contrast results.
inputs.name: Output File C Contrast

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the interaction contrast results between A and B.
inputs.name: Output File A and B Contrast

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the interaction contrast results between A and B (case-sensitive).
inputs.name: Output File A and b Contrast

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the interaction difference results between A and B.
inputs.name: Output File A and B Difference

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the interaction difference results between A and B (case-sensitive).
inputs.name: Output File A and b Difference

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the mean results of the interaction between A and B.
inputs.name: Output File AB Mean

inputs.description: Specify the output file for the bucket (combined) results.
inputs.name: Output File Bucket

inputs.description: Modified ANOVA computation options. See: https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/sscc/gangc/ANOVA_Mod.html
inputs.name: ANOVA Computation Options

output-files.description: Output file for the main ANOVA result.
output-files.name: Output File A

output-files.description: Output file for the main B ANOVA result.
output-files.name: Output File B

output-files.description: Output file for the main C ANOVA result.
output-files.name: Output File C

output-files.description: Output file for the interaction between A and B.
output-files.name: Output File AB

output-files.description: Output file for the interaction between A and C.
output-files.name: Output File AC

output-files.description: Output file for the interaction between B and C.
output-files.name: Output File BC

output-files.description: Output file for the interaction between A, B, and C.
output-files.name: Output File ABC

output-files.description: Output file for the A mean results.
output-files.name: Output File A Mean

output-files.description: Output file for the B mean results.
output-files.name: Output File B Mean
